title: The Ungifted Elf
description: An Elf wielding a magic sword journeys to find powerFor those who enjoy magic, swords and mystical creaturesEckxio, an exiled elf, journeys to a mountain in hopes of gaining an ability that all elves are born with. Since his childhood, Eckxio was unable to cast magic and relies on his magic sword and shield to survive. He hopes to find the legendary fairy king in the mountain and believes that the holy entity will grant him incredible magical powers. Eckxio desperately fights obstacles that cross his path as his faith fades away.Grab a copy today
author: A.J. Martinez
